MacroOp.Name: OMNI_STREAM_OPERATORS
MacroOp.Brief: A helper macro to implement the @c operator<< stream friend functions.
MacroOp.Description: Implements the OMNI_OSTREAM_OPERATOR and OMNI_WOSTREAM_OPERATOR macros
MacroOp.Synopsis: This macro can be utilized to implement the friend std::ostream& operator<< functions in a class.
